title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 24, 2019
description: Today on Christmas Eve, we feature a story called "Dancing Dan's Christmas" by Damon Runyon and the poem “A Christmas Carol” by G.K. Chesterton.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today on Christmas Eve, we feature a story called "Dancing Dan's Christmas" by Damon Runyon and the poem “A Christmas Carol” by G.K. Chesterton.
